name: John
descriptions: John, known simply as a wastelander in-game, is a deceased inhabitant of the Capital Wasteland in 2277, randomly encountered in Fallout 3.

John was a wastelander in a romantic relationship with Loreen. At some point, John stole a stash of books from his brother Billy. He stored them in an ammunition box at the scrapyard north of the Bethesda ruins. John later came to regret the theft and wrote a note telling Billy where he could recover the stolen books, as well as asking his brother to tell Loreen that he still loved her.

Somewhere in the Capital Wasteland, John came to be caught in a fight against three vicious dogs; two of the dogs were killed, but John eventually perished, leaving one of the dogs that mauled him alive and still lingering by his body.

More Than Just Scrap: John's corpse is found next to three vicious dogs, one living and two dead, in this random encounter. He holds John's key and the wastelander note. The key unlocks an ammunition box with three skill books at the scrapyard.
